body.p:
When you execute the deploy process for a system, a copy of the builder files is also stored on every Object Storage node in the /etc/swiftlm/builder_dir/region-<region-name> directory. You can restore the builder files as follows:
Log into the first proxy server node.To identify the first proxy node, see .
Copy the swift-rings-tarball.tar file from any other node:scp <username>@<nodename>:/etc/swiftlm/deploy_dir/swift-rings-tarball.tar /tmp
Unpack the tarball to /etc/swiftlm/builder_dir: mkdir /etc/swiftlm/builder_dir cd /etc/swiftlm/builder_dir sudo tar -xpf /tmp/swift-rings-tarball.tar
